content: knitted shawl in drops fabel and drops kid-silk the piece is worked sideways with moss stitch and edge stitches pattern fa-537 yarn group a + a or c **size** height measured down middle = approx 20 cm width measured along top = approx 110 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio 50 g colour 604 ocean view **and** drops kid-silk from garnstudio 25 g colour 07 light sky blue **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 28 row in height with moss stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm
